title: Colombia Inflation Overshoots Target for Fifth Straight Year
description: Colombian inflation exceeded the upper limit of the central bank’s target range for a fifth straight year in 2025, as policymakers weigh the need for a new round of interest-rate increases.
content: Colombian inflation exceeded the upper limit of the central bank’s target range for a fifth straight year in 2025, as policymakers weigh the need for a new round of interest-rate increases.
